code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./App.css';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes,Link}from'react-router-dom';import AboutMe from'./components/AboutMe';import Projects from'./components/Projects';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isSidebarOpen,setIsSidebarOpen]=useState(false);const toggleSidebar=()=>{setIsSidebarOpen(!isSidebarOpen);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Router,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar ".concat(isSidebarOpen?'open':'collapsed'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"toggle-btn",onClick:toggleSidebar,children:"\u2630"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",onClick:toggleSidebar,children:" Resume"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Projects",onClick:toggleSidebar,children:" Projects"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content ".concat(isSidebarOpen?'shifted':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutMe,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/Projects",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{})})]})})]})});}export default App;
